title: Passages from the English Notebooks, Complete
author: Hawthorne, Nathaniel
snippet: We walked very late, entering, after all that we had seen, into thepalace grounds, and skirting along Linlithgow Loch, which would be verybeautiful if its banks were made shadowy with trees, instead of beingalmost bare.
